snippet: Pope Francis canceled a visit to patients at a Rome hospital at the last minute on Friday because of what the Vatican called a "sudden indisposition"....

headline.print_headline: Pope Cancels Local Trip, Vatican Says No Cause for Concern
headline.main: Pope Cancels Local Trip, Vatican Says No Cause for Concern

lead_paragraph: Pope Francis canceled a visit to patients at a Rome hospital at the last minute on Friday because of what the Vatican called a "sudden indisposition".
